newsitem.title: USA: Bull Run's Capital exercises warrants.
newsitem.headline: Bull Run's Capital exercises warrants.

text.p: Bull Run Corp said Monday that Capital Sports Properties Inc, which owns 51.5 percent of Bull Run, exercised warrants to buy 447,002 shares of common stock in Host Communications Inc at $0.01 per share.
Capital's share purchase has increased Bull Run's combined direct and indirect investment in Host Communications' outstanding common shares from 9.4 percent to 29.9 percent, it said.
Bull Run added that the purchase made it the largest single common shareholder in Host Communications, which provides media and marketing services to universities and athletic associations.
Capital Sports already owns all of Host Communications' outstanding preferred stock, it said.
